channel.title: Easy to answer question please look
channel.description: ok i'm sure loads of people ask this all the time the question is how do i get the new items on my server this is what i was guess download a server with the items and add the list of ids to your game idk just please help

item.title: Easy to answer question please look
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

He thinks the server is what shows the items. This is incorrect. The client has the models for the items. So just use silabs client or x- infinity’s (RECOMMENDED, WAY BETTER THEN SILABS!!!).

Read full topic
item.source: Easy to answer question please look

item.title: Easy to answer question please look
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Any but those two. Try the Universal that C.o.D made.

BYE.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy to answer question please look
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

k, go into your item or item4 if you have czar, add the item id of the item you want under where it goes example: if its platelegs add the item id under ‘platelegs’

Then, go into your item.cfg and add the items there as well, adjust the stats to your liking. heres what it looks like in item.cfg item = 15348 Bandos_Chestplate Bandos_Chestplate. 100000000 100000000 100000000 50 50 50 50 50 100 100 100 100 100 50 11 11 3

Read full topic
